channel.title: EU(From an English point of view)
channel.description: Is it the most bollocks thing ever to be invented by a load of cocks sitting around a table? The EU is ruining our economy coz of the fucking polish coming in to steal jobs and its a load of bollocks post your views and opinions

item.title: EU(From an English point of view)
item.dc:creator: @Gotta_Catch_Them_All Gotta Catch Them All
item.description:
@Gotta_Catch_Them_All wrote:

On another topic

What’s an EU and is bullock some sort of english swear word?

EU stands for the European Union and bollocks is a slang way of saying balls but basically means shit.

Read full topic
item.source: EU(From an English point of view)

item.description:
@R.I.P_RSC wrote:

I don’t know what job this is, I think some kind of tutoring because I couldn’t understand it completely. But it’s around $1,095.94 or €710.25 a month.

item.title: EU(From an English point of view)
item.dc:creator: @bowserjr2 Bowser jr
item.description:
@bowserjr2 wrote:

[quote=“R.I.P RSC, post:15, topic:210445”][quote author=bowserjr2 link=topic=277313.msg2260495#msg2260495 date=1212623915]

European Economic Area give the polish the rigths that you are talking about, but why can’t you begin to work in Poland and take the work from them.

Why would you do that, you get less wages.

Yes but things are cheaper in Poland.
And you take revenge on the polish people by taking their work.
[/quote]

What do you think is the reason that polish people come here for work? Things are cheaper there, but wages are even lower.[/quote]
Yes i know it was just a joke, but do you know what the wages is in Poland?

Read full topic
item.source: EU(From an English point of view)

item.description:
@sanga282 wrote:

[quote=“Mopman, post:8, topic:210445”]Yet you have no problem with YOURSELF or YOUR FAMILY filtering money away from this country… just polish people?

I believe that’s xenophobia.[/quote]
its not a fear its a strong dislike personally and how exactly do i filter money out of this country? pray tell mopman also if you think about saying i buy things from other countrie or i go on holiday think again only british holidays i’,m afraid

item.title: EU(From an English point of view)
item.dc:creator: @R.I.P_RSC R.I.P RSC
item.description:
@R.I.P_RSC wrote:

If they send money home, polish people can invest more making their economy better resulting in less polish workers here. The money stays in the EU, so it doesn’t matter. Because the polish people work here there are less workers in Poland so the wages get higher so less come here, and after a while (a few years) you won’t notice it.

Read full topic

item.title: EU(From an English point of view)
item.dc:creator: @R.I.P_RSC R.I.P RSC
item.description:
@R.I.P_RSC wrote:

Like I said in IRC: polish workers in other countries > lower costs of production > lower costs of products > more consumption > more money to companies > more investments > more work > more consumption etc…

and another thingy: EU > no export taxes > lower costs > more consumption > more work etc

Read full topic
